title: P1136, P16A2, P1640 - Cornering Traction Control And Roll Over Detection Disabled

body.body: P1136, P16A2, P1640 - Cornering Traction Control And Roll Over Detection Disabled
P1136, P16A2, P1640 - Cornering Traction Control And Roll Over Detection Disabled - Fault CM8; CR8; CS8; DR5; DS5; PB1; PJ1; PJZ; PM1; PR1; PRB; PRC; PS1; PSB; PSC; PX1; PXB; PXC; PY1; PYB; PYC
Cornering Traction Control disabled due to Inertial Measurement Unit (IMU) malfunction
View and note 'freeze-frame' data if available.
Make sure ABS modulator connector is secure.
Check for associated DTC C1713, perform tests for this DTC.
Reset DTCs. If problem persists contact Triumph service.
Engine ECM detects Inertial Measurement Unit (IMU) present but with signal error
Roll-over detection disabled due to Inertial Measurement Unit (IMU) malfunction

View and note 'freeze-frame' data if available. Make sure ABS modulator connector is secure. Check for associated DTCs P16A0, P16A1, and P16A2, perform the tests for any DTC present. Reset DTCs, if problem persists contact Triumph service.
